# contentView

**Instance Property**

The main view that you add your cell’s custom content to.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var contentView: UIView { get }
```

## Discussion

When configuring a cell, you add any custom views representing your cell’s content to this view. The cell object places the content in this view in front of any background views.

## Managing the content

- **contentConfiguration**: The current content configuration of the cell.
- **automaticallyUpdatesContentConfiguration**: A Boolean value that determines whether the cell automatically updates its content configuration when its state changes.
